description: Try our easy to follow Halloumi & Snow Pea Fritters recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Savoury fritter,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Halal,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Vegetarian,Tomato
name: Halloumi & Snow Pea Fritters Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the halloumi, oats, flour and chives in a large bowl. Add the snow peas, make a well in the centre. Add the egg and buttermilk and stir until just combined.

Heat a non-stick frying pan over a medium heat. Spray with oil spray. In batches, drop 1/4 cupfuls of mixture into the pan, allowing room for spreading. Cook for 1-2 minutes, then flip and cook the other side for 1-2 minute or until the fritters are cooked through.
Divide fritters between serving plates. Serve with the tomato and rocket.
